/*! ========================================================= * Argon Dashboard React - v1.1.0 ========================================================= * Product Page: https://www.creative-tim.com/product/argon-dashboard-react * Copyright 2019 Creative Tim (https://www.creative-tim.com) * Licensed under MIT (https://github.com/creativetimofficial/argon-dashboard-react/blob/master/LICENSE.md) * Coded by Creative Tim ========================================================= * The above copyright notice and this permission notice shall be included in all copies or substantial portions of the Software. */ import React from "react"; import axios from "axios"; // reactstrap components import { Card, CardBody, CardTitle, Container, Row, Col } from "reactstrap"; class Header extends React.Component { /* Primeira letra de uma string maiscula */ capitalize = (s) => { if (typeof s !== 'string') return '' return s.charAt(0).toUpperCase() + s.slice(1) } constructor(props) { super(props); this.state = { wifi: [] }; } componentDidMount(){ axios.get( api.baseUrl, { headers: {"Authorization" : "Token 90983948ea3a66581227202c25183ef2e34ac430"} } ).then((res) => { //console.log(res.data.wifi) this.setState({wifi: res.data.wifi}) //this.wifi = res.data.wifi console.log(this.state.wifi) //console.log(res.data.wifi) }) //console.log(this.wifi.ssid) } /* componentDidMount(){ //fetch data fetch('http://127.0.0.1:8000/api/wifi/', { method: 'GET', headers: { 'Authorization': 'Token 90983948ea3a66581227202c25183ef2e34ac430' } }).then( resp => resp.json()).then( res => this.setState({wifi: res}, function() { })) .catch(error => console.log(error)) }*/ render(props) { return ( <>
{/* Card stats */}
{this.state.wifi.map(w =>
{w.ssid}

    {w.ssid}
    {w.signal}
    {w.teste}
)} 350,897

); } } export default Header;
